import React, { Component } from 'react' class Options extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.initialState = { retNbr: 3, indriRetNbr: 100 }; this.state = this.initialState } handleChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target; this.props.onChange(name, value); } restore = () => { this.setState({ ...this.initialState }); //this.props.onRestore() } render() { const { retNbr, indriRetNbr, nodeThreshold, edgeThreshold, h1, h2, h3, h4 } = this.props; var inlinestyle = {display: "inline", width: "80%"} var widthstyle = { width: "50%"} var tablelayout = {border: "0"} var align = {"textAlign": "center"} var marginbutton = {"marginLeft": "70%"}; return (
Advanced Options
Number of Results (1, ..., 20):
Number of Indri Passages (10, ..., 1000):
Node Weight Threshold (0.5, ..., 1.0):
Edge Weight Threshold (0.0, ..., 0.1):
Conversational Query Model
Hyperparameters for Scoring (values must sum up to 1.0)
Info: To know more about a concept, simply hover your mouse above it.
); } } export default Options;
